description:
Azolve is a leading business application provider, working with a wide range of sports governing bodies, membership associations, commercial businesses, government organizations and education providers.
  • Debug and optimize existing codes & Follow strict coding Standards
  • Writing complex sql queries, building rich UI components with JavaScript (in Azolve's own JS framework: Astral)
  • Writing client side scripts for managing business logic and timely delivery of projects.
  • Working with Azolve's expense, invoicing and process costing
  • Have been working for its promising membership solution GoMembershp

I had been the lead coordinator for the project. It is a workshop which includes a certification examination. The workshop had been designed for the web developers.
  • Engaging with users to build Developer relationships with the community and encourage engagement
  • Communications with developers & Googlers
  • Organize Problem oriented Events with Google technology that solve local problems for Bangladeshi community
  • Conduct code Labs and trainings

It is a training program launched by Daffodil International University for their students. I had been the lead trainer for one session.
  • Conduct classes for the trainees
  • Manage training related plans and programs
  • Engaging with trainees with their projects

To help leading the course on “Object Oriented Programming” and “Wireless Programming” with the teacher assigned to the course.
  • Helping teachers on classes and labs.
  • To take classes and labs in absence of the teacher
